settings.text:
Upgrade your period with Saalt reusable menstrual cups and discs.

Easy to use and comfortable. Live free of the tampon aisle—forever. Wear up to 12 hours to swim, run, bike, hike, or fly to Bora Bora.

settings.title: Saalt Cups
settings.copy: No pads. No strings. Just comfort. Wear all day or night, stress free.

settings.title: Saalt Discs
settings.copy: Flexible, flat fit allows for no-mess period sex. Custom finger notch for easy removal. 4 to 6 tampon capacity.

settings.title: Bundles
settings.copy: Save up to 20% and skip the guesswork with bundles custom-designed by our Saalt Coaches for all your leak needs.

settings.title: Cleaning & Extras
settings.copy: Everything you need for a fully sustainable flow.

settings.text: Buy 3+ save 15% | 5+ save 20% | 7+ save 25% on Cups, Discs, and Underwear

settings.text_content: Take the Saalt period cup quiz to find the best size and firmness for your most comfortable period.

settings.title: Saalt Cup
settings.text:
Sits in the vaginal canal.

  • Seal keeps the cup in place
  • Rests in vaginal canal
  • Great for beginners
  • Two firmness options
  • Collects 3—4x more than a tampon

settings.title: Saalt Disc
settings.text:
Sits in the fornix directly under the cervix.

  • No suction
  • Rests in vaginal fornix
  • Custom removal notch
  • No-mess period sex
  • Collects 4—6x more than a tampon

settings.title: Saalt Period Cup or Period Disc?
How to use a Saalt Cup:

settings.icon_text: First, fold your cup and insert it horizontally toward your tailbone.
Once filled (or after 12 hours), simply empty, clean, and reinsert the cup.

settings.title: How to use a Saalt Disc:

settings.icon_text: Pinch into a figure 8, then insert the disc fully and tuck behind your pubic bone.
Once filled (or after 12 hours), simply empty, clean, and reinsert the disc.

settings.title: Mackenzie
settings.text: This wonderful thing has already saved me so much time and money. I couldn't be happier!

settings.title: Jillian M.
settings.text: If you have not used a cup or a disc for period care, you are missing out on so much freedom! No more stock piles of supplies in your bathroom, purse, car. Insert and go! Done and done.

settings.title: Coleen S.
settings.text: I have been using the Saalt Cup for about 2 years now and really liked it so I was excited when they announced the Saalt Disc. I have used it for two cycles and I'm sold! It's comfortable, easy to use and I haven't had one leak despite my heavy flow.

settings.text_content:
If you're not happy with your Saalt product, we'll send you a replacement you'll love or your money back up to a full year from purchase. Why? We know that learning to use reusables can take time, but we're here to help and cheer you to Saalt bliss.
Your Saalt(isfaction) guaranteed.

settings.heading: Will period underwear smell?
settings.row_content: No, when cared for properly, your Saalt Wear should not smell! Saalt Wear is treated with a bio-based solution for odor control that removes sweat odor and eliminates bacteria to keep you fresh and odor-free.

settings.heading: Can I put it in the dryer?
settings.row_content:
Take good care of Saalt Wear, and it will take great care of you. 

After use, rinse your Saalt Wear leakproof underwear in cold water to help avoid staining. Then, hand wash or machine wash on cold, preferably in a Saalt Mesh Laundry Bag intended for delicates. You can use detergent but pass on the fabric softener, bleach, and iron to protect the tech. Proudly hang dry—energy efficient and free. We recommend avoiding putting Saalt Wear in the dryer, as high temperatures can degrade the elastics and fabric over time.

settings.heading: Can I wear them all day?
settings.row_content: Go with your flow! How long you can wear your Saalt Wear leakproof underwear before needing to change will depend on your flow and the absorbency level of the style you choose. If you are free bleeding on your heavy day, you may need to change into a fresh pair after a few hours of wear. If you’re wearing your Saalt Wear as a backup to a cup or on a light day, you may be able to wear it all day. We recommend trying Saalt Wear for the first time at home so you can see how your pair works best for your body and ~flow~.

settings.heading: Does Saalt Wear have PFAS
settings.row_content: You can rest easy knowing that Saalt does not use any PFAS in our fabric finishes. We test all materials for a wide range of known hazardous substances, including PFAS and other known harmful chemicals. As a B Corp, we’re committed to providing the safest, most effective, and responsibly-produced leakproof underwear on the market for our customers. We source our materials from factories known for making safe, green textiles. Some of our fabrics are OEKO-TEX®️ and bluesign®️ approved, which are internationally recognized standards for making textiles cleaner and more environmentally friendly. You can learn even more about PFAS on our blog.
